thread.title: In Cat Ba Island, there are two activities tourists should try.
thread.title_full: In Cat Ba Island, there are two activities tourists should try.

author: Goviet nam-2015-10-23T06:40:55-0400
title: In Cat Ba Island, there are two activities tourists should try.
text:
Travel Articles | October 23, 2015 
There are many activities tourists can take part in when in Hai Phong. In Do Son, both the Vietnamese and foreign visitors can sing to their hearts' content or just relax and unwind with a massage. 
Located in the heart of Hai Phong City, just few minutes' walk away from the Opera Square, the newly renovated Monaco Hotel Hai Phong is an intimate colonial – style, superior boutique hotel, featuring a classical colonial décor and accommodations. The hotel offers luxury boutique interiors, personalized hospitality and incomparable value money for both leisure and business travellers. The facilities and services provided by Monaco Hotel Hai Phong ensure a pleasant stay for guests. Guests of the hotel can enjoy on-site features like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour room service, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service. At the Haiphong Monaco Hotel, our accolades center from our stand out personalized service that comes from having an exceptionally friendly staff, supreme comfort, and dedication to privacy and hospitality that makes us outshine ordinary MONACO hotels. Our exceptional staff and generous wealth of complimentary amenities are the reason so many of our guests say the Haiphong Monaco Hotel offers the ultimate travel experience for those looking for a luxury boutique hotel in Hai Phong Old Quarter. 
Cat Ba Eco-Lodge is nestled in dramatic forested hills 13 km from Cat Ba Town. (Information on arriving and getting around.) We have a warm, friendly, Vietnamese staff and our restaurant proudly serves some of the best Vietnamese and International cuisine on the island. Even if you do not stay at our hotel you are still invited to stop by for a memorable lunch at our acclaimed restaurant.Our Eco-Lodge was designed and constructed with comfort in mind and it is immaculately maintained. The rooms are arranged in three separate buildings centered around the restaurant and common areas. Source: Free Articles from ArticlesFactory.com ABOUT THE AUTHOR
